title: Everytime Soraka heals me....
body:
I shed a tear to acknowledge the fact that she actually has to hurt herself & sacrificed a portion of her own health so that she can guarantee my safety at all times. Oh how it touches me when she knew I am always her first priority. :'( 

Soraka is like a mother to us all. Please, I beg you. Make the most out of what your own mother would sacrifice for you for your own good.

replies.body:
Soraka confirmed as best mom.

http://24.media.tumblr.com/d5dc48a5df6e987475905f14188395c1/tumblr_mhj8upzU9j1rl88vto1_1280.png
HAWT HAWT HAWT HAWT HAWT HAWT
I'm glad I'm not the only one who has had this thought cross their mind. xD
did you mean thought*?

> did you mean thought*?

Ooops! Yes, thanks! This is what happens when I'm on the boards super late at night.
TL;DR  Call your mothers and thank them.

Every time I kill Soraka, I feel like part of myself has died too. Like sometimes duty demands more of me than my soul can bear. Like I have done an awful, horrible thing for which I have forever incurred the wrath of fate.

{{champion:55}} {{item:3070}}
Sometimes you're just so upset that you have to shoot Garen a look  from across an Institute hallway and meet up later for some â€¦ international diplomacy.
ONLY IN DEATH IS DUTY DONE.
and just like a child you run away from me while i try to help you.
So you are saying a goat reminds you of your mother?

In more ways than one...  

Soraka is no mere goat though.  She is a Space-Goat Star-Goddess! She sacrificed her divinity in order to 'save' someone.  He then betrayed her and tried to kill her, but her selfless act showed that she is willing to risk everything to save a stranger.

> So you are saying a goat reminds you of your mother?

^LOL
Don't feel so bad, most of that health belonged to the enemy in the first place.

OMG HEAL ME RETARD
-70% hp Lucian

Me: It'd hurt me more than it helps you

IDC RETARD

*heals*
*heals*
*heals*
*recalls due to being 30% health*

An ally has been slain!

OMG RETARD WHY B
mother soraka skin confirmed !

> I do shed a tear when she heals me. But not for that reason.
> 
> 
> 
> I cry because she used to give a mega armor buff to keep me from being hurt as much along with the goodly sized heal.
> 
> 
> {{item:3070}} {{champion:16}} {{item:3070}}

Yeah I made a Raka main shortly before they announced the rework would be going live.

T_T Now it is going to be an Urgot main in protest....

liek n cri evrytiem wen bananna girl heal u

{{champion:16}}  <3
dude soraka is a vampire. she bites enemy champions then gives it to you.
Now that's what I call passive-aggressive!

Its a shame that soraka is so incredibly weak that she isn't played. Sona, Ali, and Nami all have heals that are just as effective as Soraka's. However, Soraka's heal can only be used on other champions and she lacks both an increase in damage and viable CC, which the previously mentioned champions all bring in addition to healing. Soraka has a giant target on her because she has no real self-sustain, and this results on her being poked out before she can prevent any meaningful damage on her partner. Just like the Sion rework, the Soraka rework is a flop.

This is adorable, but no.

Upvoted anyway.

I just wish they would add a use to her W... That if she self heals it doesn't cost 10% of her HP (that wouldn't make any fucking sense) but her W goes on CD for like 22 seconds.  I don't know why that's NOT a part of her kit.

> I just wish they would add a use to her W... That if she self heals it doesn't cost 10% of her HP (that wouldn't make any fucking sense) but her W goes on CD for like 22 seconds.  I don't know why that's NOT a part of her kit.

Then I don't even see how is this kit gonna be any different as the old Soraka despite the long cooldown, hence, people will still gonna use her as a mid champ again, and then get her nerfed once again.
im glad this happens, raka is annoying as fk.
It's okay baby I do it for you.
with the blood of the enemy she gives you health

guarantee lol 
enemy: focus soraka
Yeah but do you see her CD on her heal?  And her q is very spam, much harass, very heal.  Wowe

Umm I'm sorry that your mom doesn't gives you whatever you want? -_- lol

Sorry for my grammar, english isn't my native language.

Not to break your "soraka best mother" moment, but it's not a sacrifice, is the only thing she can do, the old soraka had to choice if heal herself or you, now is more like: "well, i used my other spells and i'm going to die anyway, let's use W".

PS. Soraka player since s2
